short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create deep link short URLs that open mobile apps like Amazon and YouTube from any social media browser. NOTE: account required.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With just one click or shortcut, create Deep Links for Amazon, Youtube, and many other mobile apps. Deep links are short urls that force mobiles to open apps directly.

IMPORTANT: You need a free LinkTw.in account to use this extension. The free plan includes 1,000 clicks per month.

This is a BETA version - please provide feedback@linktw.in as we will be improving the extension with the feedback provided.

Would also be very appreciated if you write an honest review after you've used it for a while and we release the final public version.
